title: Poster, ca. 1980
inscribed: Text: "I do not want / merely to appeal to your head / I want to capture your heart." Imprinted in brown ink on bottom: "distributed by the War Resisters Leagueto celebrate its 60th Anniversary WRL, 339 Lafayette Street, New York, NY 10012"
creditline: Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs
